title: Le Sucre = the Sugar
abstract: Note: Adapted from 'L'horizon' by Georges Conchon.
description: Adrien, a wealthy retiree, meets Raoul, a hot-shot commodities broker who sweet talks him into speculating on the recent rise in sugar prices. Grezillo, the "sugar king" is using the rumour mill to create panic buying of sugar and maintain the prices at high level. Adrien sees his capital double in value and decides to use Raoul's scheme again. But the market turns around ...  Credits: Producers, Georgio Silvagni, Lise Fayolle ; director, Jacques Rouffio ; writers, Georges Conchon, Jacques Rouffio ; photography, Rene Mathelin ; music, Philippe Sarde. Cast: Gerard Depardieu, Jean Carmet, Michel Piccoli, Nelly Borgeaud, Roger Hanin, Marthe Villalonga, Claude Pieplu, Georges Descrieres, Jean-Paul Muel, Toni Taffin.
